contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Take part in QF’s Qatar National Day Instagram Competition

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Guess the activity in the QF Qatar National Day tent to win prizes.

For the occasion of Qatar National Day, QF is hosting an exciting competition exclusively for its Instagram followers.

From 10 to 17 December, QF will be posting jumbled images of activities in the QF tent at Darb El-Saai. All participants have to do guess the activity correctly.

To take part, leave a comment with the correct answer. The first five followers to comment with the correct answer will be awarded 10, 8, 6, 4 and 2 points.

On National Day (18 December), QF will announce the winners with the most points.

Questions will be posted on the QF Instagram account (@qatarfoundation) on alternate days at 12pm. Stay tuned for the first question on 10 December.

Click here for full competition rules and other information.
